column4: Does mplayer stretch the video for anyone else? Or is there something wrong?
only if the vid has got the wrong aspect ratio.
are you using gmplayer (or mplayer-gui as it is sometimes called) or mplayer?
you have a lot of options to chose from. if you use "mplayer -zoom -fs filename.avi" does it scale correctly?
It looks the same I think. This is what it says when I run that, "Movie-Aspect is 1.19:1 - prescaling to correct movie aspect.
wow, that's actually stretched more... That doesn't make sense...
ok, so the vid you are trying to watch is a bit strange.
1.19:1 is called "movietone" apparently. 35mm used in late 1920-1930.
it says, "Error parsing option on the command line: -aspect"
should work. it works here. "mplayer -zoom -aspect 1.19:1 filename.avi"
